name: Fridge Game
description:
Play as the world's first rocket... spring... something-powered Fridge in this exhilarating exercise of physical prowess! Scale the heights of the... city? Face the mighty green donut! Comprehend the futility of existence as the unending nature of your task becomes apparent and you realize the only escape is to Alt-F4.

In all seriousness, we forgot to add an exit button; you will need to Alt-F4 to close the game. Our apologies in advance.

CREDITS
Caroline Chou (Art)
Sydney Fonderie (Gameplay Programming)
Nikhil Medanki (Animation)
Gabriel Oliver (UX Programming)
Selin Ovali (Level Design)
